mapper.insert: INSERT INTO INQUIRY (INQUIRY_NUM, CUS_NUM, SECRET_STATUS, TITLE, CONTENTS, REG_DATE, MOD_DATE, ITEM_NUM) VALUES (INQUIRY_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{cusNum}, #{secretStatus}, #{title}, #{contents}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, #{itemNum})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, DATA.* FROM (SELECT INQ.INQUIRY_NUM, INQ.SECRET_STATUS, CUS.CUS_NICK_NAME, INQ.TITLE, INQ.ITEM_NUM, INQ.REG_DATE, INQ.MOD_DATE FROM CUSTOMER CUS, INQUIRY INQ WHERE CUS.CUS_NUM = INQ.CUS_NUM ORDER BY INQUIRY_NUM DESC) DATA ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{begin} AND #{end} ORDER BY INQUIRY_NUM DESC
